en.language:

=> 1) English

en.operator:
Which of the following operator would you like to use?
=> Select by typing in the number of the operator.
=> 1) Addition

=> 3) Multiplication
=> 4) Division
en.notValid: I'm sorry, what you entered wasn't valid! Please try again.
